textSub.name: para1
textSub.string:
Rumor has it a deadly barracuda has been terrorizing this 
 part of the ocean! Watch for the the early warning signs,
 and get out of the way!

textSub.name: para2
textSub.string:
Feeling Lucky?
 Bite the barracuda's tail to score some extra points -
 but be careful, he just might bite back!
